articles.description: Levels of nitrogen dioxide (NO2) were higher at 11 south London streets when residential roads were closed and dropped when seven Wandsworth Council schemes were halted, reports say.

articles.title: Volcano discovery: Chain of Alaskan volcanoes may form one giant supervolcano caldera - Daily Express
articles.description: VOLCANOES grouped together in a remote part of Alaska may all share a single caldera, making them in effect a supervolcano, experts have announced.
